review: This product sounds good, but please read before you spend your hard earned money. If you think you will save any money with this product you are WRONG!. Every show, series and movie I have been remotely interested in watching has a ridiculous price tag. The advertisement makes it look like many shows are free. Maybe if your a huge Gomer pyle or happy days fan. Any remotely modern show is more expensive to watch thenit is to go to Box stores and purchase the entire series on DVD. This horrible service is a SCAM. The bright side is the actual device is outstanding, but I never use it due to the criminal prices set by the greedy people at Amazon. I bought the entire first season of  the tv show "the 100" on DVD which I can even loan to my friends for 12 dollars cheaper than it was offered on amazon prime, actually even cheaper than that if you bought the HD version on amazon prime....this service is a joke...STAY WITH CABLE
